Title: Edvard Eidum to Alma C. Wilson Card 1949.12
Description: POSTCARD FROM EDVARD EIDUM POST STAMPED IN DECEMBER – 1949 (THE DATE IS ILLEGIBLE), TO MRS. ALMA WILSON, 108. VEST 5. ST., DELL RAPIDS, S DAKOTA, U.S.A. (HE HAS USED JOHN'S ADDRESS).  THE CARD HAS A PICTURE OF NARVIK ON IT, AND THREE MOSS GREEN 30 ØRE STAMPS WITH LION.
Creator: Edvard Eidum
Siri Lawson, trans.
